scripts.convert: node scripts/convertCrops.js ../tmp/seed-scraper/data-tmps/crops/data.json data/crops.converted.json && node scripts/convertStates.js ../tmp/seed-scraper/data-tmps/crops/data.json data/states.converted.json data/stateCodeMap.json && node scripts/convertMandis.js ../tmp/seed-scraper/data-tmps/crops/data.json data/mandis.converted.json data/stateCodeMap.json && node scripts/convertPrices.js enam ../tmp/seed-scraper/data-tmps/crops/enam.json data/prices.converted.json data/crops.converted.json data/mandis.converted.json
